entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
